job.command:
cd ${SUBMITTINGDIRECTORY} set evtsFile = $INPUTFILE0;
set filel = `basename $evtsFile .event.root` set dir = `dirname $evtsFile`; echo "${evtsFile}" if (! -r ${evtsFile}) exit 1; set logFile = ${filel}B.log if ( -r $logFile) exit 0; set muFile = ${filel}.MuDst.root if (-r $muFile) exit 0; set out = ${filel}.event.root # set fitter = ",KFVertex,StiCA"; #,HLTCA" set ddir = `pwd` set case = `basename $ddir`; echo "case = $case"; echo $case | grep PPV if (! $?) set fitter = ",VFPPVnoCTB,useBTOF4Vtx,Sti"; echo $case | grep CA if (! $?) set fitter = ",VFPPVnoCTB,useBTOF4Vtx,StiCA"; echo $case | grep KF if (! $?) set fitter = ",KFVertex,StiCA"; echo $case | grep NoExB if ( $? ) set fitter = ${fitter}",Corr4,OSpaceZ2,OGridLeak3D"; echo "fitter $fitter" setenv STARFPE NO setenv NODEBUG yes echo $case | grep 15j if (! $?) then setup gcc setup 32b starver SL15j endif echo $case | grep SL15 if (! $?) then setup gcc setup 32b starver DEV2/SL15 endif set tagFile = ${filel}.root # root4star -q -b 'bfc.C(9999,"in'${fitter}',pp2013a,mtd,btof,fmsDat,fgt,fgtPoint,BEmcChkStat,beamline,-evout,-geantout,NoHistos,noTags,noRunco,-MiniMcEvent,-MiniMcMk,Corr4,OSpaceZ2,OGridLeak3D,Tree,ReadAll","'${evtsFile}'","'${out}'","'${tagFile}'")' >& ${logFile} root4star -q -b 'bfc.C(9999,"in'${fitter}',pp2013a,emcY2,mtd,btof,fgt,fgtPoint,BEmcChkStat,beamline,-evout,-geantout,NoHistos,noTags,noRunco,-MiniMcEvent,-MiniMcMk,Tree,ReadAll","'${evtsFile}'","'${out}'","'${tagFile}'")' >& ${logFile} endif
